name: Trip to the moon
description:
Game homage to "Trip to the moon" 1902 by Georges Méliès

"My dear friend,  We were delighted by your expression of interest in taking part in our first expedition to the moon! Incredible and marvelous adventures are waiting for you. I am confident that you will overcome all the obstacles you encounter with your immeasurable courage as always! Good luck and farewell young man!

Credits

Charline Foch

Francesca Foffano 

Carlos Gonzalez Diaz
